00013         <div style="margin: 0 20px 0 310px">
00014                 <h2>
00015                         <?php echo l("About EmeRails"); ?>
00016                 </h2>
00017                 <p>
00018                         In the middle of February 2008, I became unsatisfied with the current homebrew framework I was using for
00019                         the Emeraldion Lodge, EmePavilion. I felt the need for a solid platform that was object-oriented, fully
00020                         <acronym title="Model View Controller">MVC</acronym> compliant, and had an
00021                         <acronym title="Object Relational Mapping">ORM</acronym> layer that relieved me from having to hardcode
00022                         repetitive query patterns.
00023                 </p>
00024                 <p>
00025                         I then tried to write from scratch a lightweight clone of
00026                         <a href="http://www.rubyonrails.org" class="external">Ruby on Rails</a>,
00027                         by replicating much of their ActiveRecord model class, and a convention-based development model.
00028                         I struggled against the syntactical and practical limitations of the language I am bound to with my hosting,
00029                         <a href="http://www.php.net" class="external">PHP</a>, but at the end I had a working framework in less
00030                         than a month.
00031                 </p>
00032                 <p>
00033                         EmeRails supports page caching, action filtering and a lot of useful features that save coding time and
00034                         server load.
00035                         I am quite satisfied about the result, and I am looking forward to improving it and smudging the edges
00036                         that are still rough in the future.
00037                 </p>
00038                 
00039                 <h3>Let&rsquo;s show off!</h3>
00040                 <ul>
00041                         <li>
00042                                 <?php print a('Show this page without layout markup', array('href' => $this->url_to_myself() . '?nolayout')); ?>.
00043                                 This demonstrates how the actions are rendered.
00044                         </li>
00045                         <li>
00046                                 <?php print a('Show this page in Morse code', array('href' => $this->url_to_myself() . '?hl=morse')); ?>.
00047                                 This demonstrates how filters can be applied to the response before it is served.
00048                         </li>
00049                 </ul>
00050         </div>
00051         <div class="clear">
00052         </div>
00053 </div>
